channel.title: Lotus Japonicus on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Lotus Japonicus on funPlantGenes

item.title: CYP716A51
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj4g3v3014670 Gene Symbol: CYP716A51 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: CYP716A51 is involved in C-28-oxidized triterpenoid biosynthesis in planta.

item.title: LjbHLH7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj0g3v0343449 Gene Symbol: LjbHLH7 Gene Name: MeJA-responsive bHLH transcription factor Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: MeJA-responsive bHLH transcription factor LjbHLH7 regulates cyanogenic glucoside biosynthesis in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjCCD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LjSGA_131670.1 Gene Symbol: LjCCD7 Gene Name: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE 7 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE 7 modulates plant growth, reproduction, senescence, and determinate nodulation in the model legume Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjCYC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjCYC1 Gene Name: CYCLOIDEA1 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjCYC Genes Constitute Floral Dorsoventral Asymmetry in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjCYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjCYC2 Gene Name: CYCLOIDEA2 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjCYC Genes Constitute Floral Dorsoventral Asymmetry in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjCYC3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjCYC3 Gene Name: CYCLOIDEA3 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjCYC Genes Constitute Floral Dorsoventral Asymmetry in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjCYP93E1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj1g3v3555800 Gene Symbol: LjCYP93E1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjCYP93E1 converted β-amyrin into 24-hydroxy-β-amyrin, a metabolic intermediate of soyasapogenols.

item.title: LjENOD40–1

item.title: LjENOD40–2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjENOD40–2 Gene Name: early nodulin-2 protein Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Two ENOD40 genes of L.

item.title: LjERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjERF1 Gene Name: transcription factor AP2-EREBP Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: A Positive Regulatory Role for LjERF1 in the Nodulation Process Is Revealed by Systematic Analysis of Nodule-Associated Transcription Factors of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjIPT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjIPT3 Gene Name: isopentenyltransferase3 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Knockdown of LjIPT3 influences nodule development in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjJAZ4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj4g3v2215580 Gene Symbol: LjJAZ4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: The transcriptional activity of LjbHLH7 was suppressed by the interaction with the L.

item.title: Ljlazy3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj3g3v2576600 Gene Symbol: Ljlazy3-1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LAZY3 plays a pivotal role in positive root gravitropism in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjMAMI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjMAMI Gene Name: MYB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: An AM-induced, MYB-family gene of Lotus japonicus (LjMAMI) affects root growth in an AM-independent manner.

item.title: LjMATE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjMATE1 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion (MATE) protein1 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjMATE1: A Citrate Transporter Responsible for Iron Supply to the Nodule Infection Zone of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjMOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CM2163.80 Gene Symbol: LjMOT1 Gene Name: molybdate transporter 1 Genome: L.

item.title: LjNAC094
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj2g3v1058050.1 Gene Symbol: LjNAC094 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Description: Overexpression of NAC094 induces premature nodule senescence Knocking out NAC094 partially relieves nitrate-induced degradation of leghemoglobins and abolishes nodule expression of senescence-associated genes (SAGs) that contain a conserved binding motif for NAC094.

item.title: LjNPF2.9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj2g3v1349210.1 Gene Symbol: LjNPF2.9 Gene Name: nitrate/peptide transporter 2 Genome: genomic assembly build 3.

item.title: LjNRT2.4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj1g3v3646440.1 Gene Symbol: LjNRT2.4 Gene Name: Genome: genomic assembly build 3.

item.title: LjPCS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjPCS3 Gene Name: phytochelatin synthase PCS3-7N Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Functional Characterization of an Unusual Phytochelatin Synthase, LjPCS3, of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjPLT11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj4g3v0937820 Gene Symbol: LjPLT11 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Description: The results indicate that LjPLT11 plays a key role in adjustment of the levels of its substrate pinitol, and thus maintenance of osmotic balance in infected cells and peribacteroid membrane stability during nodule development.

item.title: LjSYP32-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjSYP32-1 Gene Name: Sed5 -like SNARE Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: We identified a Sed5 -like clone LjSYP32-1 which contributes to nodule tissue formation and plant growth in Lotus japonicus.
